name: Crispy Tofu Bites
author: Sufia
summary: Crispy bites of tofu with a crunchy exterior and a creamy interior. Serve with any of your favorite dips, like Thai peanut sauce or teriyaki.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package extra firm tofu, drained and pressed
2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed
directions: Drain tofu, place on a plate, and stack heavy plates on top of it to drain any extra moisture, at least 15 minutes
Combine flour, cornstarch, salt, and pepper in a gallon-size resealable plastic bag
Toss tofu into bag, seal completely, and shake to coat
Transfer tofu pieces to a plate, shaking off any excess flour
Pour vegetable oil into a skillet; heat on medium-high until just smoking
Cook tofu, turning often, until golden brown on all sides, about 5 minutes per side
